title: Ticket #5721: config/submit language should support multiline values
description:
At times it would be helpful to be able to set multiline values in the configuration and/or submit files. The primary use case here is the job router, where routes usually span multiple lines and must currently use the \ at the end of each line to permit correct parsing.

The new syntax will be 

config file
JOB_ROUTER_DEFAULTS @=end
[
  requirements=target.WantJobRouter is True;
  delete_WantJobRouter = true;
  set_requirements = true;
]
@end

this will result in the config knob JOB_ROUTER_DEFAULTS having the value 

[
requirements=target.WantJobRouter is True;
delete_WantJobRouter = true;
set_requirements = true;
]
